name: Chaos.net
description:
Try To Keep Your Online Store Alive As You Randomly Get New Users, Your Games Glitch, Manage Refunds And Fix The Crashing Page 

This Game Is One Of My First And Was Made For The Brackeys 2021.2 Game Jam

This Game Ties To The Theme Of Let There be Chaos As You Randomly Get Influxes Of Users So You Need To Manage The Chaos That Suddenly Unfolds.

Made By Drew

Hoping To Update Later
